details: Learn C basics, data types, and control structures to begin programming with C language.
Explore algorithms, analyze their efficiency, and solve problems using algorithms in various domains.
Understand C++ fundamentals for implementing data structures and algorithms effectively.
Study essential data structures like arrays, linked lists, and trees, and their applications in programming.
Dive into Python's object-oriented programming, classes, inheritance, and encapsulation for software development.
Learn software development processes, methodologies and project management techniques in software engineering.
Discover Amazon Web Services (AWS) and cloud computing concepts for scalable and efficient cloud-based solutions.
Gain insights into MySQL database management, SQL queries, and database design for data-driven applications.
Enhance problem-solving skills, tackle real-world challenges, and practice critical thinking for diverse problem domains.
